element.name: Akimbo Shooting
element.supports: Fighting Style, Gun Tactics, Fighter, Paladin, Ranger, Inventor, Bard, Gunslinger

description.p: When wielding two light firearms, you can add your ability score modifier to the damage of the second attack. You can reload both light firearms at once using a bonus action.

element.name: Breacher
element.supports: Fighting Style, Gun Tactics, Fighter, Paladin, Ranger, Inventor, Bard, Gunslinger

description.p: When you make an attack with a firearm at a creature within 15 feet of you and you roll a 1 or 2 on the damage die, you can reroll the damage die and must take the new roll, even if the number is a 1 or a 2. The firearm must have the close quarters or scatter property for you to gain this benefit.
